about_the_game:
You have 24 hours before this land reaches it's doom. Use your limited time to:

Explore:

A small but dense and frequently changing world, with 4 distinct biomes, each with its own set of points of interest where you will encounter all kinds of creatures and constructs to fight. Knowledge about this land is the key to success, and the more you play, the more accustomed you will become to what enemies you may encounter in each area and what resources you gain from defeating them. Conquering the terrain and mastering the ability to quickly plan routes towards the equipment you desire is one of your main goals across every playthrough.

Fight:

The diverse inhabitants of this land, each located in different parts of the world. Graze enemy attacks to regain health and use your expansive arsenal to fight back. Challenge grand bosses which will test your skills of memorizing their attacks and knowing what weapons to use for each situation. Defeating them grants you loot but also speeds up the countdown, so plan carefully which to kill and which to ignore.

Collect:

An arsenal of over 250 weapons, spells and other items to assist you in combat; with limitless possibilities for combos and strategies. Being creative and making sure you have an well-rounded inventory with tools for every situation is top priority; as in the end, it will be put to test against one of 3 final bosses.

Unlock:

After each victory, you may unlock other playable characters. From simply encouraging different playstyles to overhauling systems like your health, they recontextualize what you knew and allow for even more possibilities. Bring multiple characters per run and make sure to split your time across each one, and by doing so, uncover new areas and greater challenges.

short_description: You have 24 hours to explore this land and prepare for its inevitable end. Fight a variety of enemies and bosses; discover a huge arsenal with near-endless potential for player expression and, through each attempt, learn to do it as efficiently as possible.
